definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
to lose output/a drop in crop yield/reduction in production
to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
to add or subtract/to increase or decrease/to go up or go down

sentences.english: His punishment of death was commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他被從死刑減爲無期徒刑。

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行動導致被判處死刑，後來減爲有期徒刑。

sentences.english: You need to exercise and lose some weight.
Healthy eating helps to reduce your blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 健康口腹能幫忙減低血糖。

sentences.english: Obviously, if the balance of pleasure over pain is positive, that's better than zero.
sentences.chinese: 顯然如果快樂減痛苦是正的，即比零大。

sentences.english: I am also in the store down so, that is good.
sentences.chinese: 我也是在那個店裏減得，覺得是不錯。

sentences.english: But its impact on Chinese science and technology should not diminish.
sentences.chinese: 但求是科技基金會在中國科技界的影響力絕不減褪。

sentences.english: I'd say a solid B minus.
sentences.chinese: 我會給你一個實實在在的B減。

sentences.english: Simple math tool to practice add, subtra - Simple math tool to practice add, subtract, multiply, and divide.
sentences.chinese: 簡單的數學工具用來執行加，減，乘，除運算。

sentences.english: During transient preload reduction, the diastolic stiffness constant was measured directly.
sentences.chinese: 在短暫前負荷減少時，直接測量出舒張期僵硬度常數。

sentences.english: T1 I can cancel those, T2 and then I'm going to multiply through by T1.
sentences.chinese: 然後乘以，所以這等於T2除以T1減。

sentences.english: In general, when freedom diminishes, motivation contracts as well.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，當自由度減小時，動機也會縮小。

sentences.english: Visitors, if allowed by the health care facility should be kept to a minimum.
sentences.chinese: 若衛生機關允許訪客，仍應將數量減到最低。

sentences.english: The practice of removing the white cells from blood is called leukoreduction.
sentences.chinese: 從血液中去除白細胞稱爲減白血球。

sentences.english: Do not try to cut or dig out the curving toenail.
sentences.chinese: 不要試圖自己減或者把彎曲的指甲挖出來。

definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
